001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.paper;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Ticks;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.Task;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.effect.PaperEffectors;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.plugin.BasePlugin;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.raycast.PaperRaycast;
008import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.scheduler.PaperScheduler;
009import org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity;
010import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
011import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
012
013import java.text.DecimalFormat;
014import java.text.DecimalFormatSymbols;
015import java.util.HashMap;
016import java.util.Locale;
017import java.util.Map;
018
019public final class CalibrePlugin extends BasePlugin<CalibrePlugin> {
020    private static final Map<Locale, DecimalFormat> DECIMAL_FORMATS = new HashMap<>();
021
022    private final PaperScheduler scheduler = new PaperScheduler(this);
023    private final PaperEffectors effectors = new PaperEffectors(this);
024    private final Map<Player, PlayerData> playerData = new HashMap<>();
025    private final Explosions explosions = new Explosions(this);
026    private final Penetration penetration = new Penetration(this);
027    private PaperRaycast.Builder raycastBuilder;
028
029    public PaperScheduler scheduler() { return scheduler; }
030    public PaperEffectors effectors() { return effectors; }
031    public Explosions explosions() { return explosions; }
032    public Penetration penetration() { return penetration; }
033    public PaperRaycast.Builder raycastBuilder() { return raycastBuilder; }
034
035    public PlayerData playerData(Player player) {
036        return playerData.computeIfAbsent(player, k -> new PlayerData(this, k));
037    }
038
039    @Override
040    public void onEnable() {
041        super.onEnable();
042
043        scheduler.run(Task.repeating(ctx -> {
044            var iter = playerData.entrySet().iterator();
045            while (iter.hasNext()) {
046                var entry = iter.next();
047                if (entry.getKey().isValid()) {
048                    ctx.run(Task.single(entry.getValue()::tick));
049                } else
050                    iter.remove();
051            }
052        }, Ticks.MSPT));
053    }
054
055    public void damage(LivingEntity entity, double damage, @Nullable LivingEntity source) {
056        if (entity == source)
057            entity.damage(damage);
058        else
059            entity.damage(damage, source);
060    }
061
062    @Override
063    public void load() {
064        super.load();
065        explosions.load();
066        penetration.load();
067        raycastBuilder = PaperRaycast.builder(); // TODO raycast options
068        for (var data : playerData.values()) {
069            data.load();
070        }
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    protected CalibreCommand createCommand() throws Exception {
075        return new CalibreCommand(this);
076    }
077
078    public static String format2(Locale locale, double value) {
079        DecimalFormat format = DECIMAL_FORMATS.computeIfAbsent(locale, k -> new DecimalFormat("0.##", DecimalFormatSymbols.getInstance(k)));
080        return format.format(value);
081    }
082
083    public static String format2Raw(Locale locale, double value) {
084        return String.format(locale, "%.2f", value);
085    }
086}
